featured.text: But trading online is gaining popularity these days, with several sites in bills operation, including HomeExchanges.

definition.zh_def: 家庭交換，指兩個家庭在一定期間內互相交換居住的房屋或公寓。
definition.en_def: Home exchanges refer to the practice of two families swapping their homes for a certain period.
definition.example: We decided to try home exchanges for our vacation to save on accommodation costs.
